name: DX
label: Device Exposure
description: An interventions domain that contains a subject's exposure to a medical device under study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102617, 2018-06-29)
datasetStructure: One record per recorded intervention occurrence or constant treatment interval per subject

name: DE
label: Device Events
description: An events domain that contains data for device-related events. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102616, 2018-06-29)
datasetStructure: One record per event per device

name: DT
label: Device Tracking and Disposition
description: A events domain that contains the logistics and disposition information specific to a given device. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102621, 2018-06-29)
datasetStructure: One record per device tracking event

name: DU
label: Device-In-Use
description: A findings domain that contains the measurements and settings that are intentionally set on a device when it is in use. These are characteristics that exist for the device, and have a specific setting for a use instance. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102622, 2018-06-29)
datasetStructure: One record per property or setting per time point per visit or test date per subject

name: DO
label: Device Properties
description: A findings domain that contains the device characteristics that do not vary over the course of the study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102619, 2018-06-29)
datasetStructure: One record per property per device

name: DR
label: Device-Subject Relationships
description: A special-purpose domain that contains the linkage of each subject to the device(s) to which they may have been exposed during the study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102620, 2018-06-29)

name: DI
label: Device Identifiers
description: A special-purpose domain containing information that identifies a specific device unit. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102618, 2018-06-29)
datasetStructure: One record per device identifier per device
